H0.text: Who is featured on Puff Daddy's Can't Hold Me Down. Jay-Z

H1.text: Who is featured on Puff Daddy's Can't Hold Me Down. Lil' Kim

A4.text: His debut single, 'Can't Nobody Hold Me Down', spent 28 weeks on the Billboard Hot 100 chart, peaking at number one.
